features.name: Splash Screen
features.description: App loading screen with navigation logic to Login or Home based on authentication state

features.name: Authentication System
features.description: Google Sign-In integration with Firebase Auth, user state management, and logout functionality

features.name: Home Screen
features.description: Main events listing with search, filter, tabs (All Events, My RSVP, Past Events), and pull-to-refresh

features.name: Event Details
features.description: Full event information display with RSVP functionality, attendees list, share, and edit/delete for creators

features.name: Add/Edit Event
features.description: Form for creating and editing events with validation, image upload, date/time picker, and category selection

features.name: My RSVPs
features.description: List of events user has RSVPed to with ability to revoke RSVP and view event details

features.name: Profile Management
features.description: User profile display with settings, language/theme switching, logout, and navigation to other screens

features.name: About/Help
features.description: App information, FAQ, contact details, features list, and external links (email, website, GitHub)

features.name: Data Models
features.description: AppUser and Event models with Firestore integration, serialization, and data validation

features.name: Firebase Services
features.description: Firestore database operations, Firebase Storage for images, and Firebase Auth for authentication

features.name: Navigation & Routing
features.description: GetX named routing system with route definitions, bindings, and navigation management

features.name: Localization
features.description: Multi-language support (English, Arabic, Hindi) with RTL/LTR layout support and dynamic language switching

features.name: App Entry Point
features.description: Main app initialization with Firebase setup, GetX configuration, localization, and routing
